entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
